title: Adani Electricity carves out Dahanu Thermal Power Station
description: Adani Electricity Mumbai has signed a business transfer agreement with its subsidiary North Maharashtra Power Limited to carve out the Adani Dahanu Thermal Power Station. This move, aimed at meeting ESG norms, is expected to attract ESG-focused investors. The transaction is valued at Rs 815 crore and awaits regulatory approval.
